fields.name: break_speed_walls
fields.description: How fast the hammer mines per second. Caps out at 60 per second.
fields.info: You can go kinda crazy with this, actually. Buuuuuut, 40 is overkill tbh. Go kinda crazy. Not too crazy.

fields.name: break_power_walls
fields.description: Used for deciding what kinds of walls it can mine.
fields.info: Unlike other tools, the hammer always takes 3 hits to mine. The hammer can only mine walls, and the break power is used to avoid progression skips, etc.
